document.full_text: the two-time defending champions earned a berth in the round of 16 for the 18th straight year and will face their biog east rival georgetown on sunday.
document.title: college roundup | connecticut 64; purdue 40: defense puts uconn on track to a rout
lines_and_colors: the two-time defending champions earned a berth in the round of 16 for the 18th straight year and will face their biog east rival georgetown on sunday.
